DOC.brief_summary: This observational study aim investigate VIMPAT® use adjunctive therapy clinical practice also evaluate subsequent change drug load patient addition VIMPAT® treatment regimen .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Changes Total Drug Load Seizure Frequency Using Vimpat® ( Lacosamide ) Combination Therapy
DOC.criteria: The patient receive Vimpat® 7 day prior start NonInterventional Study ( NIS ) The patient must diagnosis epilepsy partialonset seizure without secondary generalization Based physician 's clinical judgment , patient 's best interest prescribe adjunctive Vimpat® ( ie , decision prescribe Vimpat® make physician ) Patient must least 18 year age The patient must least one seizure within last 3 month prior enrolment
